title: Working on a Keen sprite!
content:
I am making my own Keen sprite![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] here is my opinion about it so far...

Walking animation: Average
It looks nice so far but not perfect. The worst thing about it is the fact that his arms only change position when he is shooting, in an ice block, when he dies, and when he uses his pogo, making him look weird when he walks. Don't worry, I will make his arms animate in the walking animation.

Jumping animation: Poor
When he jumps, his legs shrink! (basically because I'm bad at making jumping animations) Also, his arms might look better if they move as he jumps, but I'm not sure. One more thing. Part of his helmet (the black part at the very top) disappears at the "falling" frame. I don't feel like fixing this.

Map animations: Terrible
There aren't any new map sprites yet! Yay!

Pogo animation: Bad
The black part at the very top disappears at the first pogo frame and comes back at the "pogo landed" frame. Also, the pogo animation looks (sort of) weird.

Ice block animation: Bad
The Keen sprite inside the ice looks nice, but it's barely an animation. (His head just flips. That's it.) Also, the ice Keen is in looks horrible.

Gun animation: Horrible
It is just a walking sprite holding a gun straight out. Boo!

Total: Average
It's not very good but not very bad either. :P-------------------
A proud member of the beta testing society
[url=http://www.garfield.com/comics/comics_todays.html]www.garfield.com/comics/comics_todays.html[/url]

title: Re: Working on a Keen sprite!
content:
Do you mean you don't have floppy disks, or no floppy disk drive?
Cause floppy disk are cheap (i think)

Modkeen in XP:
Go to Start/Programs/Accesories/command prompt
Type in "X:" (replace x with the drive letter) to change drives.
Type "cd folder/folder/etc..." to change folders.
Type "cd .." to go up a folder.
Type "dir" to see the contents of a folder.
Now find the folder with modkeen. Run modkeen by typing "modkeen"

Ok?
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: hehe
content:
If you look at the normal Keen:Vorticons sprite, the black line at the top of Keen's helmet disappears during their pogo frame, too. I always thought the default "shoot" frame was lame, and the jump/fall sprite was mediocre. *shrug*

Hope you find a way to show us, soon!

title: Just finishe it!
content:
I just got the entire skin done! Now to give my review...

Walk/Stand: Poor/Average
The standing sprite doesn't look good but doesn't look bad either. The problem is that it's arms move strange when walking (Yes, I (obviously) did animate the arms!).
Pros: The arms now move
Cons: The standing sprite falls down one tile in the beginning of the level. Can some one email me/post a download a file with 16 levels where keen starts a little higher than usual? (make sure there are no viruses in them!)[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]

Jump: Poor
As I said, when he jumps, his legs shrink. Also on the "falling" sprite, the black part at the very top disappears. An other thing with the "falling" sprite is that all Keen is doing on this frame is standing on his toes (not the tips though), yet he manages to jump rather high with his "magical" foot. Wow.
Pros: Uh.. Keen blinks in one frame, I geuss?
Cons: There might be to many to type.

Map: Good
I like the map sprite I drew. It's not too god but it looks nice.
Pros: It looks adorable!
Cons:At first you could walk out of mars with out cheating by pressing Left/Right and Up/Down quickly. I had already fixed this a few minutes before posting this post, though, and now you have to cheat to get out of mars.

Ice: Terrible
As I said, The Keen sprite inside the ice looks nice, but it's barely an animation. (His head just flips. That's it.) Also, the ice Keen is in looks horrible.
Pros: It is finally a different sprite (my own sprite!).

Gun: Horrible
Just a modified walking sprite. Boo!
Pros: No
Cons: Yes

Total: Average
It is not good but it is not bad either. It might be worth a try. I'm planning on getting cable for my 98, so I can let everyone see my work with out going through more work.

Download: Maybe

Host: Maybe

//: It's not , , or but I would still like it if you gave me credit before you used it any where.-------------------

title: Changed ice sprite
content:
I've added horizontal cyan lines to the ice sprites. It looks better, but not perfect.

REVEIW

Walk/Stand: Poor/Average
The standing sprite doesn't look good but doesn't look bad either. The problem is that it's arms move strange when walking (Yes, I (obviously) did animate the arms!).
Pros: The arms now move
Cons: The standing sprite falls down one tile in the beginning of the level. Can some one email me/post a download a file with 16 levels where keen starts a little higher than usual? (make sure there are no viruses in them!)

Jump: Poor
As I said, when he jumps, his legs shrink. Also on the "falling" sprite, the black part at the very top disappears. An other thing with the "falling" sprite is that all Keen is doing on this frame is standing on his toes (not the tips though), yet he manages to jump rather high with his "magical" foot. Wow.
Pros: Uh.. Keen blinks in one frame, I guuss?
Cons: There might be to many to type.

Map: Good
I like the map sprite I drew. It's not too god but it looks nice.
Pros: It looks adorable!
Cons:At first you could walk out of mars with out cheating by pressing Left/Right and Up/Down quickly. I had already fixed this a few minutes before posting this post, though, and now you have to cheat to get out of mars.

Ice: Terrible
As I said, The Keen sprite inside the ice looks nice, but it's barely an animation. (His head just flips. That's it.) Also, the ice Keen is in looks horrible.
Pros: It is finally a different sprite (my own sprite!).

Gun: Horrible
Just a modified walking sprite. Boo!
Pros: No
Cons: Yes

Die: Poor
A modified standing sprite. It just inverts rapidly. (You will under stand a little better if you see it.)

Total: Average
It is not good but it is not bad either. It might be worth a try. I'm planning on getting cable for my 98, so I can let everyone see my work with out going through more work.

Download: Maybe
